title: Himi 565
lyrics:
7 laui 8
(Ko e ‘Ofa’anga ‘o e Laumālie)
1.
Sīsū na’e polo’i mo’ou
Hoku laumālie ni,
Sio ki he tahi hou,
‘Eku meimei ngoto heni.
Puke, Sīsū, ‘o fufū,
Lolotonga ‘a e afā:
Pea u ma’u taulanga ū,
Faaki ki ho fatafata.
2.
Hono ai mo haku ū
‘I he kovi kehekehe?
‘Oku ou hūfanga atu
Tāupe ‘ia Koe pē.
‘Ē, fofola hoku ‘ulu
Malu ‘o ho kapakau,
Hiki ki ho makatu’u,
Fakahū ho falehau.
3.
Sīsū e, ko Koe pē
Si’eku mata’ikoloa;
‘Ikai ha’aku sio kehe;
Ka ma’u Koe, maʻu kotoa.
‘A, ‘e fēfē ha’aku lava
Ke maʻu Koe ē ma’aku?
Faitotonu ho huafa,
Ka ko Fonuhia pē au.
4.
Ka ka fonu pē ‘a Koe
He kelesi ‘ufi hia.
‘E, lilingi mai ke mole
‘Eku fakalielia:
Kae manako ai ho loto
Ki he palakū ko au,
Pea fai ‘eta nonofo,
Fakahū ho falehau.
5.
Pea u ‘ilo ai ‘a e monū
He fe’ao mo e Tu’i:
Sio atu ta’e pulou,
Inu ki he vai mo’ui.
Fauniteni he Vaiola
Hake hoku loto ē,
Kau kamata hē ho’ ʻofa
Maʻu ‘i langi hono toe.*
